column1: Uchi////This place is spectacular. An excellent vibe
column2: with also a great vegetarian menu as well. The Tarabagani sashimi is absolutely superb and highly recommended. It was simply cooked to perfection with flavors that popped with every bite. The kinoko nabe was a well cooked rice dish as well. For dessert
column4: an excellent combination of condensed milk
column6: and dark chocolate. Would definitely recommend a stop here!
